page.title: 17SCHOOLS AND LESSONS
page.content: St. Edmund Arrowsmith is a Roman Catholic Secondary School. Everyday we have eight lessons, which each last thirty five minutes. The following are some of the subjects studied, Craft, Mathematics, English, French, Religious Education, Science, Geography and History. There are four different types of school in Blackburn, Nursery School for 3 to 5 year olds, Infant School for 5 to 7 year olds, Junior School for 7 to 11 year olds and Secondary School for 11 to 18 year olds. When you have finished Secondary School you can go on to College, Polytechnic or University. There you will specialise in one subject. You will spend a few years here and gain a qualification, such as a degree. Alternatively you may leave school at any time after the age of 16.
